products.title: Nagaland Tuensang Washed AA
products.body_html:
From the lush hills of Nagaland, Tuensang Washed AA celebrates India’s lesser-known coffee-growing frontiers. This washed Arabica is roasted to a medium-dark profile, making it the perfect companion for milk-based drinks while holding its own as a bold black cup.

Expect comforting layers of Cocoa, Sweet Spices, and Jaggery, lifted by a gentle hint of Orange zest. With a round body, low acidity, and a lingering chocolatey sweetness, this coffee is crafted for those who love richness with just the right touch of brightness.

Enjoy it as an espresso, cappuccino, flat white, or any milk-forward creation , a true crowd-pleaser with character.

products.title: Salawara Bio Reactor Naturals (SCA 86+)
products.body_html:
Innovation meets terroir in this standout lot from Salawara Estate, processed by two visionary brothers who are pushing the boundaries of Indian specialty coffee. This coffee undergoes a 72-hour bio-yeast fermentation in controlled bioreactors, where temperature, pH, and key variables are precisely managed. Unlike traditional weather-dependent fermentations, this method delivers a clean, consistent, and uniquely expressive profile in every cup.

We’ve roasted this coffee light to preserve its vibrant origin character and highlight the estate’s experimental edge. In the cup, expect layers of blackcurrant jam, raisin, black grape, date, and pineapple, unfolding into a sweet, juicy finish that keeps you reaching for another sip.

With an impressive SCA score of 86+, this lot is a perfect companion for pourovers and other manual brews, where its complexity and sweetness truly shine. A coffee that doesn’t just taste good—it tells the story of where Indian coffee is headed.

variants.title: 200g x 4 / Cold Brew / Channi / French Press

products.title: Zoya Yeast Anaerobic Naturals (SCA 86+)
products.body_html:
This is not your everyday coffee. Grown at Zoya Estate in Chikmagalur, this rare lot has been fermented with a wild yeast for 68 hours and then slowly dried on raised beds – a process that makes it extra complex.

Profile roasted to a light-medium , the cup is bursting with fruity notes of berries, grapes, papaya, melon, and mandarin. It’s smooth, balanced, and full of layers, with just the right amount of acidity, sweetness, and body.

Best enjoyed as a filter brew on V60, AeroPress, or even a Moka Pot, this coffee is perfect for anyone looking to experience something truly special in their cup.

variants.title: 200g x 4 / Cold Brew/ French Press/ Channi

products.title: Gungegiri Honey Sun Dried
products.body_html:
Our partnership with the Sangameshwar group enters its 4th year, and Gungegiri continues to be one of our most loved coffees to roast. After last year’s dual-fermented washed, we’re excited to share something new – the Honey Sun Dried (HSD).

This SLN 9 varietal goes through a 27-hour anaerobic honey process, followed by careful sun-drying, which gives it a layered sweetness and a bright, clean cup. Roasted to a light-medium profile, the coffee shines with notes of sugarcane, sweet lime, hints of florals, and raisins.

The taste profile is sweet and citrusy, with a gentle floral finish, making it a perfect choice for manual brews like V60, AeroPress, or pour-overs.

products.title: Nagaland Kohima Washed AA
products.body_html:
Our second coffee from Nagaland comes from the lush hills of Kohima, showcasing the region’s growing potential for specialty coffee. This washed AA lot has been roasted to a medium-dark profile, making it an absolute treat for espresso and milk-based beverages.

Expect bold dark chocolate tones, layered with tropical fruit brightness, a touch of honeyed sweetness, and a creamy cashew-like finish. With a medium+ body, low acidity, and medium+ sweetness, this coffee delivers a smooth, indulgent cup every time.

Perfect for Espresso, Moka pot, or French press, it’s a versatile, crowd-pleasing brew that has already impressed us with its performance.

products.title: Nagaland Tuensang Peaberry (SCA 85+)
products.body_html:
Our first-ever launch from Nagaland comes from the highlands of Tuensang, where the SLN9 varietal grows at 1450 masl in soils rich with natural nutrients. This unique terroir shapes the cup with depth, clarity, and vibrancy.

Processed as a washed peaberry, it brings out bright notes of dried apricot, peach, dragon fruit, and grapefruit zest. With a balanced acidity, sweetness, and body, this lot is ideal for manual brews like pourover, AeroPress, or Clever Dripper — offering a clean, fruit-forward experience.

If you’re looking to explore a new Indian origin with distinct character, this coffee won’t disappoint.

variants.title: 200g x 4 / Cold Brew / Channi / French Press

products.title: Thogarihunkal Honey Sun Dried (SCA 85+)
products.body_html:
A special lot from the hills of Chikmagalur, crafted with care at Thogarihunkal Estate.

This light roast opens up with vibrant fruity notes of guava, pink grapefruit, and cherry cola, ends with a floral finish. With a bright medium+ acidity, balanced sweetness, and a clean floral finish, it shines best when brewed as a pourover, Aeropress, or adventurous light roast espresso.

In the Honey Sun Dried (HSD) process, the coffee beans are dried with their sticky mucilage still intact. As they rest on raised beds under the sun, the mucilage turns into a golden, honey-like layer — enhancing sweetness and unlocking complex fruit-forward flavours.

variants.title: 200g x 4 / Cold Brew / Channi / French Press

products.title: Dawn Cold Brew Blend
products.body_html: Here's our take to offer you something refreshing , introducing Dawn, a vibrant cold brew blend which offers a combination of funky yet complex palette with a citrusy long finish . This blend features 3 uniquely processed coffees from our newest partner farm Unakki Estate, Chikmagalur. The coffee starts with balanced notes of chocolate with naturals adding to the fruity and berry notes and complimented by the sweet and citrus notes offered by the black honey coffee. This is sure pleaser for our cold brew fans but also works well across other manual brewing methods.

variants.title: 200 g / French Press/ Cold Brew/ Channi
1 kg / French Press/ Cold Brew/ Channi

products.title: Melkodige Wine Yeast Anaerobic Naturals (SCA 88+)
products.body_html: This special coffee comes from Melkodige Estate , Chikmagalur and is a Brazilian Red Obata varietal. It’s been fermented for 72 hours using wine yeast in an anaerobic process, giving it a rich and fruity profile. Roasted light-medium, it has tasting notes of Strawberry Iced Tea, Raspberry, Purple Grape, and Plum. With a juicy acidity, medium body, and balanced sweetness, it’s perfect for manual brews like pour-over or AeroPress. You can also enjoy it as a light roast espresso. This is our second year working with this exciting international varietal.

variants.title: 200g x 4 / Cold Brew/ French Press/ Channi

products.title: Thogarihunkal Washed A
products.body_html:
For the past three years, Thogarihunkal Washed A has been one of our most loved single origins — and for good reason.

This medium roast is a true daily driver, offering a comforting, balanced cup that suits just about any brew method. With notes of milk chocolate, black tea, grape, and almond, it’s an easy choice whether you enjoy your coffee black or with milk.

Its low acidity, medium sweetness, and smooth medium body make it an all-rounder — perfect for milk-based hot and iced drinks, or as a clean, satisfying americano.

We’ve been proud to work closely with Thogarihunkal Estate over the years to bring you this washed coffee that continues to be a crowd favourite.

variants.title: 200 g / French Press / Cold Brew / Channi
1 kg / French Press / Cold Brew / Channi

products.title: Wave
products.body_html:
Crafted from a bold mix of Arabica and Robusta beans, this medium-dark roast offers a full-bodied experience with minimal acidity. Its rich, well-rounded profile makes it a perfect choice for those who enjoy a smooth yet intense cup.
With notes of bittersweet chocolate, butter biscuits, and caramel, every sip delivers a deep, comforting flavour with a subtly sweet, biscuity finish. Whether brewed as an espresso or a strong black coffee, this blend provides a satisfying balance of depth and smoothness.

variants.title: 1 kg / French Press/ Cold Brew/ Channi
200 g / French Press/ Cold Brew/ Channi

products.title: Midnight Blues
products.body_html:
Crafted for those who love a bold yet balanced cup, this dark roast blend is made from 100% Arabica beans, expertly sourced from washed and naturally processed coffees. Roasted to a deep, rich profile—darker than a medium roast but not as intense as a Vienna roast—this blend offers a smooth and full-bodied experience with low acidity.
Savor notes of cacao nibs, sweet spices, and toasted nuts, creating a comforting and well-rounded flavour. Whether brewed as an espresso or a classic drip coffee, this blend delivers a satisfying depth without overwhelming bitterness. Perfect for those who enjoy a refined yet robust dark roast.

variants.title: 1 kg / French Press/ Cold Brew/ Channi
200 g / French Press/ Cold Brew/ Channi

products.title: Equinox
products.body_html: This unique arabica blend is an amalgamation of 3 different coffees with 3 distinct processing techniques namely washed, honey and monsooned. The resultant cup is balanced with notes of hazelnut, chocolate, and maple syrup, complemented by a soft finish. Equinox offers medium acidity and a medium body, creating a rich and smooth espresso experience that’s perfect for any time of day.

products.title: Attikan Pichia Culture Washed (SCA 84+)
products.body_html: Attikan Pichia Washed is a bold and complex SLN 9 coffee from Attikan Estate, processed in a 40-hour controlled fermentation using lactobacillus and pichia yeast cultures. After fermentation, the cherries are pulped, washed, and slow-dried on raised beds for 15 days to develop depth and balance. Roasted medium-dark for espresso and milk based drink lovers, this cup delivers rich notes of raisin, star fruit, brown sugar, and chocolate. Expect a sweet, chocolatey base uplifted by subtle citrus brightness—perfect for milk-based drinks or as espresso.

products.title: Harley Whiskey Barrel Aged (SCA 87+)
products.body_html: Grown at elevation of 1050 MASL in the Sakleshpur region of Karnataka, these washed coffee’s from Harley Estate undergo a barrel ageing process in single malt whiskey barrels sourced from Amrut Distillers. This produces a cup which is fruity, boozy and sweet with notes of irish cream, green apple, stone fruit and hints of spice. The coffee is roasted to a medium level to increase the sweetness and balance the body & mallic acidity of the coffee. This coffee is suitable for espresso, pourover, aeropress and French press.

products.title: Monsoon Malabar AA
products.body_html:
A method unique to India, where the beans undergo a monsooning process for a duration of 3 months near the Malabar coast where they are exposed to the moist monsoon winds to give them a unique flavour profile and in the process the beans swell up and fade resulting in a nutty and earthy coffee with reduced levels of acidity.

This coffee is one of the world’s most sought after Indian coffees across the world, we have profiled this coffee as a medium roast to highlight the balance and sweetness of the coffee. Monsoon Malabar is a treat for the fresh press, mokapot and espresso brewers.

products.title: Thogarihunkal Robusta Naturals A
products.body_html: This coffee is a naturally processed canephora varietal, hand-picked and dried under direct sunlight on the drying yard for 12-14 days until the moisture is about 11%. You can enjoy this super buttery cup with a biscuity mouthfeel with very little harshness (very tough to find in a Robusta) and a long caramel aftertaste which lingers on. This coffee is sure pleaser for the moka pot and espresso fans.

variants.title: 200 g / French Press / Cold Brew / Channi

products.title: Cappuccino Cup & Saucer
products.body_html: A set of Cappuccino cup (240 ml) and Saucer in pink colour.

products.title: Dusk Cold Brew Blend
products.body_html: Presenting Dusk our versatile medium-dark cold brew blend, an amalgamation of two washed coffees which adds the body and chocolatiness and a monsooned coffee which makes the brew smooth & nutty with a malty finish. This blend delivers rich notes of dark chocolate, roasted nuts, and caramel. Perfect as a cold brew or espresso, Dusk offers a smooth, indulgent coffee experience that's sure to satisfy your taste buds. This blend can be consumed with or without milk.

variants.title: 200 g / French Press/ Cold Brew/ Channi
1 kg / French Press/ Cold Brew/ Channi

products.title: Truffle Twilight
products.body_html: Our bestseller blend which combines two washed coffees one from Baarbara Estate and another one from Attikan Estate roasted to a medium- dark level to offer a fudgy chocolate like coffee with heavy body, minimal acidty and dried fruit overtones. This blend pairs extremely well with milk and is suitable for espresso , mokapot and French press brews.

variants.title: 200g x 5 / French Press/ Cold Brew/ Channi

products.title: Vienna Roast
products.body_html: For the people who like their coffee strong, here’s presenting our Vienna roast which is the darkest of our standard roasts meant for the people who want the strong kick in their morning cup. Pairs beautifully with milk and best suited to be brewed on a French Press, Mokapot, Espresso Machine or a South Indian Filter.

products.title: Timemore Chestnut C2 Manual Grinder
products.body_html:
About this item:

  • The stainless-steel grinding core is precision CNC cutting and shaping, the sharp blade can quickly and evenly cut coffee beans, the grinding is labor-saving and smooth, and the grinding time is short.
  • Easy to adjust grinding thickness to meet different needs.
  • High-precision CNC steel grinding core.
  • [Excellent blade]: The milling blade with 55-58HRC hardness in 5-axis CNC machining realizes uniform grinding with almost no excessively coarse grains. At the same time, the generation of fine powder is minimized.
